summary: An email from Jill Greenfield, a partner at the law firm Fieldfisher, to an unnamed recipient regarding a client who wishes to speak to the recipient about managing an unspecified matter, possibly related to travel. The email is brief and appears to be setting up a communication.

persons.name: Jill Greenfield
persons.context: Author of the email, acting on behalf of an unnamed client who wishes to speak to the recipient.

locations: Riverbank House, 2 Swan Lane, London EC4R 3TT, England
keyFacts: Jill Greenfield, a lawyer at Fieldfisher, emailed an unnamed recipient on September 15, 2020.
The email indicates Greenfield's client wants to speak to the recipient about how they would 'manage this,' with a secondary question about the recipient's travel plans.
The subject line and context suggest the communication may be related to the Epstein case, but the specific matter is not detailed in the provided text.
